full_summary:
=====================================

# Government Tender Announcement
=====================================

### Title (French and English): 
IBM Storage Scale Subscription and Support (or equivalent) 
Abonnement et support IBM Storage Scale (ou équivalent)

### File identifier (GC Code or reference number):
SSC-23-00024809: T

### Tender details:

### Solicitation Number:
BPM020294/24809

### Publication Date:
2023-12-12

**Declaration of closure**
================

The tender for IBM Storage Scale Subscription and Support (Or Equivalent) will expire on the following date.
 
* **Closing Date:** 2023-12-28T14:00:00
* **Amended closing date:** 28 December 2023, 2:00 PM (Amendment 001)

### Contracting Authority:
================ Automate federal services with Shared Services Canada

```sql
+--------------------------------+
| Contracting entity info      |
+--------------------------------+
| Contractor name:              | Shared Services Canada - Services partagés Canada
| Phone:                        | (613) 324-4061
| Fax:                          | (613) 960-6007
| Address:                      | Raiyane Benchekroun, 180 Kent St, 13 Floor, Ottawa 
|                               | Ontario + Postal code: K1G 4A8, Country: CANADA
+--------------------------------+
```

### Contact Information:

Raiyane Benchekroun,  
(613) 324-4061,  
Raiyane Benchekroun, 180 rue Kent St, 13 Floor, Ottawa, Ontario K1G 4A8, CANADA  

### Trade Agreements:

Open only to suppliers from Quebec, except the National Capital Region. Suppliers can be selected from Canadian suppliers that have an existing relationship with Shared Services Canada.

### Tender Details 
================ Here is a download link where you can access supporting documents:

https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/E7722286-B5F0-404F-86C6-08A08D84119B for English pages.  French links available upon request.
